title: Ehud Olmert
summary: Ehud Olmert (/ˈoʊlmərt, -mɛərt/;[1] Hebrew: אֶהוּד אוֹלְמֶרְט‎, IPA: [eˈhud ˈolmeʁt] (listen); born 30 September 1945) is an Israeli politician and lawyer. He served as the 12th Prime Minister of Israel from 2006 to 2009 and before that as a cabinet minister from 1988 to 1992 and from 2003 to 2006. Between his first and second stints as a cabinet member, he served as mayor of Jerusalem from 1993 to 2003. After serving as PM he was sentenced to serve a prison term over convictions for accepting bribes and for obstruction of justice during his terms as mayor of Jerusalem and as trade minister.
